import {React, useState} from "react"; import {Modal, ModalBody, Container,Form,Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import Logo from '../img/logo.svg' const TelaLogin = () =>{ const [modal,setModal] = useState({status:false,message:"",variant:"",icon:""}) const [credencial,setCredencial] = useState({user:"",password:""}) return ( <> setModal(modal.status=false)}> {modal.message}
